reviews.review_msg: This is my second class with Newton (ASC201 in 2014). As a senior, I believe the class is a failure. Newton's lectures are void of analysis (bynd claiming PRC protects minorities LOL), and what is more troubling, at best inaccurate. Frequent errors, zero citations, errors in test design. No critical thought taught, rather repetition demanded. Stop.

don't trust people when they say that this class is easy. I am a chinese born student and trust me is it not easy. It is all based on reading and the questions of the mc and its hard. the final was mc and short answer. the short answer were easy but the mc, oh boy i'm pretty sure i guess on 80% of it.

Newton offers an easy course, full of nothing. The material is quite simple, yet during lectures he goes a methodical pace. He skims his own notes which he reads off his printed powerpoint presentations, yet somehow he will end up behind. Attendance is mandatory for grade, exam like quizzes, and assignmentspapers that are approx 750 words each.
Never liked history class, but I really enjoyed this one!

You can tell just by looking at him that he's a good guy. Don't bother buying the textbooks, you won't need it. I have to say though, this prof is super boring. However, the class is extremely easy, just try a bit(like really little) and you'll get an A. I didn't even try and bombed my midterm and still got a B+. Assignments are super easy as well.

he really cares about his students and is really patient to listen our voice. the mt questions are all mc, and the final are mc and t/f, both of which are strongly realted to his notes and what he said during the lecs, so i recommend u to attend the classes although only around 20~40 ppl appeared~

REALLY ZEN! Nice and easy-going. I loved the paper I wrote and this was a great course. The midterm was okay but the final was pretty tough, I'm pretty sure I dropped a letter grade because of it! Study for the final!

I liked this class~Instructor Newton had made this class very interesting and he made everything clear! He is very patient with his students and he tries very hard to make class environment fun my telling funny stories :)

Love this class!!! Super nice guy.  He's very passionate about what he teaches and he tells funny stories. Interesting lectures.  Very clear on what he expects on the exams.  Marking is extremely fair and the exams are fair.  It's enjoyable to listen to him in lecture because he has a calm voice.  Always available for help.  Good class!!!
